name: Eval & GO
tag_list: surveys, online-software, market-research, reports, questionnaires, online-suite, online-survey-software, eval-and-go, evalgo, evalandgo, evalngo
overview:
Eval & GO is a fully integrated online survey solution.

The suite includes survey creation, advanced reporting and analysis, design customization and contact management. The drag and drop technology provides for easy survey creation based on hundreds of possible question types and options. The Look & Feel generator allows users to personalize their surveys to suit their image and needs using over 200 customizable variables. The fully integrated IDAE (Intelligent Data Analysis Engine) allows users to perform advanced analysis tailored to their requirements using drag and drop technology with no previous data analysis skills required. Advanced cross-tabulation and scoring are both possible. Users can then get a 1-click automatic report or build their own reports. Reports can also have customized designs to add ultra-professional finish and then be ready for export to Word, PDF, Excel or for publishing online. Our software functions in real-time, meaning that data analysis and reports are always up to date. In addition, our contact manager allows users to create and manage their own contact database easily and efficiently. Eval&GO is a comprehensive survey solution, providing the follow-up and analysis needed to turn surveys into meaningful data that our clients can use to make important decisions about their business.
